label: weightUnitWeightMeasure
comment: A measure of a volume for this specified fuel.
A weight for which this calculated emission is measured.

rangeIncludes.comment: The numeric value determined by weight measuring.

domainIncludes.comment: A calculation of the pollution (including noise, heat, and radiation etc.) discharged into the environment by a residential, commercial, or industrial facility or by a means of transport, such as a vessel, aircraft or truck.
Any specified material that is burnt or altered in order to obtain energy.
